== Fedora ==

Tested on Fedora 14 Desktop Edition

Install prerequisites before compiling:
  * yum install gcc
  * yum install libstdc++-devel
  * yum install gcc-c++
  * yum install fuse
  * yum install fuse-devel
  * yum install curl-devel
  * yum install libxml2-devel
  * yum install openssl-devel
  * yum install mailcap
